footer.title: Small Sea word where you cnat create island.

controls.title: Sea World controls
controls.subTitle: Select the size of the sea

instructions.title: Instructions:
items: It is a small sea world where the user can build islands.
You can click on the world and add or remove land and create tiny island.
You canmodify the amount of cells on the grid with sliders X and Y
An island is a collection of cells that are filled and connected in the X or Y axis (Not diagonally).
Display the amounts of islands that are present on the grid to the user.
